title: Canada could be the next nation to ban social media for kids
content: The Liberal government is considering a ban for kids under 14 as it drafts online harm legislation.
creator: Mickey Djuric

title: Merz, Meloni rally behind disinfo-fighting center that Trump thinks is ‘wasteful’
content: German and Italian leaders want to hold the line against Russia's hybrid threats.
creator: Sam Clark

title: Document reveals EU-US pitch for $800B postwar Ukraine ‘prosperity’ plan
content: The proposal hinges on a ceasefire that remains elusive while Russian leader Vladimir Putin persists with his full-scale invasion.
creator: Sarah Wheaton, Gerardo Fortuna, Kathryn Carlson, Gregorio Sorgi

title: Grok could have produced 3 million sexual deepfakes in 11 days, says estimate
content: European regulators have yet to decide how to handle the explosion of nonconsensual deepfakes on the platform.
creator: Eliza Gkritsi

title: TikTok lands $14B deal to avoid US ban
content: The new owners will include Oracle, a tech giant co-founded by Trump ally Larry Ellison.
creator: Katherine Long

title: Ursula von der Leyen’s trade troubles are just beginning
content: Despite notching up wins abroad, the European Commission has hit a wall with EU countries and lawmakers.
creator: Camille Gijs

title: EU Parliament backs Thierry Breton in free speech spat with Washington
content: U.S. visa ban sets "a dangerous precedent" for the EU, lawmakers warn.
creator: Seb Starcevic

title: Court rules TikTok Canada can continue to operate — for now
content: Federal judge quashes government order that would have shuttered the company’s Canadian business offices.
creator: Mickey Djuric

title: Too American? Brussels’ embrace of US corporate jargon sparks language row
content: Ursula von der Leyen’s Davos cheerleading for U.S. corporate terms gets the side eye from lovers of Latin.
creator: Jacob Parry

title: Former EU tech czar Thierry Breton doesn’t hate the US — even though it sanctioned him
content: Travel bans targeting individual EU officials are "unjustified" and should be "corrected," Breton told POLITICO.
creator: Nicholas Vinocur

title: Ryanair’s Michael O’Leary wants you to know he’s sick of Donald Trump and Elon Musk
content: Meet the Irish corporate titan who's actually willing to call the U.S. president a "liar" and the world's richest man an "idiot."
creator: Tommaso Lecca

title: Beijing pledges to defend tech crown jewels against EU cyber rules
content: China will take “necessary measures” to protect Huawei and others if the EU imposes new supply chain restrictions, foreign ministry said.
creator: Sam Clark

title: Berlin weighs digital tax in response to Trump tariff threats
content: Calls grow in Chancellor Friedrich Merz’s coalition and conservative bloc to target Big Tech.
creator: Frida Preuß, Jasper Bennink, Jürgen Klöckner

title: The EU’s magical, mystery trade weapon — and other options to nail Trump
content: POLITICO analyzes the actions that European leaders can consider when they gather for an emergency summit this week.
creator: Koen Verhelst, Carlo Martuscelli
